block.p: A table on April 8 with a report on executive pay included an incorrect figure from Equilar Inc., an executive compensation research firm, for the value of equity holdings of Glenn A. Britt, chief executive of Time Warner Cable. And a correction in this space last Sunday gave another incorrect figure from the firm for those equity holdings. The value was $10.8 million -- not $25.8 million or $10.5 million.

A table on April 8 with a report on executive pay included an incorrect figure from Equilar Inc., an executive compensation research firm, for the value of equity holdings of Glenn A. The value was $10.8 million -- not $25.8 million or $10.5 million.
